entry.title: Welcome to our new blog!
entry.summary: If you read this, chances are our blog is now up! We are proud to annouce that we got a new blog for Scratch Addons.
entry.content:
Hello, everyone. If you can read this, chances are our blog is now up. Welcome!

We are proud to announce that we got a new blog for Scratch Addons. Currently, this is the only post, but expect updates, tips, and other things in the next days. We can't wait to share them to you.

Stay tuned with the new posts on our available channels, like YouTube, Discord, etc. We also got a RSS feed if you are into that sort of thing.
